hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // ""' | { read file_path; if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.py$'; then ~/.conda/envs/neuromf/bin/python -m ruff check --fix "$file_path" 2>/dev/null; ~/.conda/envs/neuromf/bin/python -m ruff format "$file_path" 2>/dev/null; fi; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // ""' | { read file_path; case "$file_path" in *.env*|*credentials*|*secret*) echo 'BLOCKED: sensitive file' >&2; exit 2;; esac; }

notify-send --app-name='Claude Code' --icon=dialog-information 'neuromf Task Complete' "$(jq -r '.notification // "Task finished"')" 2>/dev/null; (paplay /usr/share/sounds/freedesktop/stereo/window-attention.oga 2>/dev/null || canberra-gtk-play -i complete 2>/dev/null) &
